name: CloudFrontLogging
description: Logging is a property of the DistributionConfig property that enables Amazon CloudFront to deliver access logs for each distribution to an Amazon Simple Storage Service (S3) bucket.

properties.name: Bucket
properties.description: The Amazon S3 bucket address where access logs are stored, for example, mybucket.s3.amazonaws.com.

properties.name: IncludeCookies
properties.description: Indicates whether CloudFront includes cookies in access logs.

properties.name: Prefix
properties.description: A prefix for the access log file names for this distribution.
